record.title: EXTENSION OF MORNING BUSINESS
record.narrative:
EXTENSION OF MORNING BUSINESS -- (Senate - December 10, 2008)

[Page: S10852]

speaking.paragraph: Madam President, I further ask unanimous consent that the period for morning business be extended beyond 4 o'clock, and that I be permitted to speak in morning business for up to 15 minutes.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
